item-1.title: SCHEDULE MANAGEMENT
item-1.description: You can schedule directly on the app

item-4.title: AUTOMATIC NOTIFICATIONS
item-4.description: Automatically notify your customers about their play schedules

item-1.title: All essential information on one screen
item-1.description: With revenue charts, activity notifications, and employee booking transactions. You can control everything.

item-2.title: Manage playground in real-time
item-2.description: Know which playground is in use. How long they play. Whose playground it is. No need to waste time searching. Now displayed right on the screen.

item-3.title: Customizable system as per your requirements.
item-3.description: The system already has great features. But if you want more. Contact us for consultation to modify the management system as per your exact needs.

item-4.title: And many more features awaiting your discovery.
item-4.description: oYoo Merchant is the optimal application for managing rental sports playgrounds, helping you professionally and effectively manage playground bookings. With powerful and user-friendly features, oYoo Merchant will be a valuable assistant for all sports playground owners.

feature-common.item-8: Support online payment methods, auto booking approval

item-1.name: Floyd Miles
item-1.review: The app is very convenient, helping me easily find and schedule play with teammates. I am very satisfied with oYoo's service.

item-2.name: Mildred Wagner
item-2.review: Great app, helping me quickly and easily find playgrounds. I have found many teammates to play with thanks to oYoo.

item-3.name: Mildred Wagner
item-3.review: Great, I have found many teammates to play with thanks to oYoo.

item-4.name: Eleanor Pena
item-4.review: I am very impressed with the user-friendly interface and features of the oYoo app. Highly recommended.

item-5.name: Ronald Richards
item-5.review: This app has saved me a lot of time in finding and booking playgrounds. Very satisfied with oYoo.

item-6.name: Jenny Wilson
item-6.review: Thanks to oYoo, I can easily find playgrounds every weekend. This is a great app!

item-7.name: Cameron Williamson
item-7.review: Very useful and user-friendly app. I have recommended it to many friends to use oYoo.

item-8.name: Esther Howard
item-8.review: oYoo's service is truly excellent. I have had great experiences using this app.

app-download.description: Comprehensive sports field management. Simplify management, field booking.. Optimize time and increase operational efficiency, the perfect solution for all your sports field management needs.
